about.intro:
Fontaine means `spring` in French.
Water is the source of life, and a spring is where water overflows.

We chose this name because We want to share happiness and spirit of enjoying music.
For the reason that we put '...' is with the idea of permanence. 

We hope that our group will continue this troupe for a long time to come and that it will never be complete. 

To be a warm place like home for everyone. Our goal is to be a place where we can continue to create  high quality music.
about.history1:
We were founded in December 2016.
Started working mainly in Tochigi.
about.history2:
October 2017 
The first concert was held in Niigata Prefecture.
Opened activities.
about.history3: The first regular concert series was held in February 2018.
about.history4: As of 2022, we are working towards even higher goals.
